experience.position: QA Engineer, Business Analyst, and Product Owner
experience.description: led cross-country POS rollouts across Europe—aligning legal, business, and tech requirements—while driving Agile delivery, QA excellence, and stakeholder collaboration to ensure smooth market launches
achievements: Led EU POS rollouts, aligned legal needs, managed resources, synced stakeholders, and bridged global goals with local market priorities.

Led EU POS rollouts in Italy, Lithuania, and Hungary while bridging legal, tech, and business needs while ensuring compliance, clarity, and smooth delivery.
Led POS testing, created documentation, ensured compliance and performance, and resolved bugs with Dev teams to deliver smooth, reliable rollouts.

Implemented API testing strategy for microservices architecture
Collaborated with development teams to establish testing standards
